participant_1.background:
I am in recovery from alcoholism and my pets are a great support.
i have a cat named charlie.
I love to volunteer at my local animal shelter to get hands-on experience with animals and learn more about veterinary medicine.
i despise my boss.
my friends and i go hiking all the time.

participant_2.background:
I don't have enough hours in the day to do all the things I love.
i like having my back scratched.
my favorite book is the bible.
i live in a suburb of boston.
i always put my left sock on first.

content.text: Hi, I'm in recovery from alcoholism and my pets are a great support. What are you into?
I don't have enough hours in the day to do all the things I love. What do you do for fun?
I love to volunteer at my local animal shelter to get hands-on experience with animals and learn more about veterinary medicine.
That's great! I love animals, too. Do you have any pets?
I have a cat named Charlie. He's a great companion.
Aw, I love cats! I used to have a cat, but he passed away a few years ago.
Thanks. I still miss him a lot.
I know the feeling. I lost my dog a few years ago, and I still think about him all the time.
I'm glad you have Charlie to help you through that.
Me too. He's a great friend.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I love to go hiking with my friends. We go on a lot of adventures together.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I wish I had friends to go hiking with.
You should find some! It's a great way to get exercise and spend time with friends.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
